sentences.sContent: Compulsory pilotage, but no port communication station.
sentences.sContent_eng: Compulsory pilotage, but no port communication station.
sentences.sCn: 强制引航，但没有港口通讯电台。

sentences.sContent: Not compulsory pilotage, but get the best pilot the ship to help the pilot with navigation station contact Mercedes Kong.
sentences.sContent_eng: Not compulsory pilotage, but get the best pilot the ship to help the pilot with navigation station contact Mercedes Kong.
sentences.sCn: 不强制引航，但大船最好获得领航员的帮助，引航可与梅塞德斯港领航站联系。

synos.tran: 领航；[水运]领港费；驾驶术；领航费

words.tran: 领港；近岸航行法；地标领航；半工厂性检查

trans.tranOther: the act of piloting an aircraft or ship
